@Adelaide_FC @erinphillips131 Is playing like she has dreamed of all her life, go get them, you Champion. @aflwomens #AFLWCrowsGiants
Go Crows! So happy Women can finally play real Footy, not just unofficial Games like we used to do. #AFLWCrowsGiants @Adelaide_FC @AFL
@StevieVanZandt Saw Richie & Orianthi after the Concert in Adelaide, was so funny they were walking through the crowd unnoticed except by us
@Adelaide_FC #AuskickCrow warming up in the front yard. #aflwomens @afl #weflyasone @aflnt @aflwomens… https://t.co/8NhRpaH6wc
Good luck Crows, hope my Great Niece gets to have a photo with you all, she is playing Auskick, so excited.… https://t.co/hOErNmU7He
@MattWebber77 @springsteen Hi, it's only $50. :-) Have a great night, wished I could go again, always miss out on The River, love that song
@TripleMAdelaide @TheAdelaideOval Meanwhile at the #AFLWBluesPies Game, they had to lock the gates, not a Boxing fan. @AFL
@aflwomens A Man & Collingwood Fan told me today, Women shouldn't play Football, I rest my case. @Adelaide_FC :-) Great Game @7Sport #AFLW
@CNN @CNNStyle Can't wait to see it. I recommend everybody read more about Coober Pedy, it's such a unique place, love it. #SouthAustralia
@Adelaide_FC It's even more exciting for me now, my Great Niece has been chosen to play in the Auskick Crows Team. :-) @Fages1 #weflyasone
Exclusive Earthquake Security Vision https://t.co/9BtBMfsH5i via @Adelaide_FC
@BBCStumped @BBCSport #AdelaideOval of course, it's beautiful, traditional and loved by Cricketers Worldwide. @CricketAus
@springsteen Can't stop talking about yáll, even at the Doctor's today,they said I'm suffering from Bruce fever, need to relax at The River.
@springsteen Listening to 'The River' again, ironically it's stuck in my head & u didn't sing it, someone get us to another Concert please.
@andylassner @SallyQYates Always a Dictator, he isn't doing the USA Economy any good either, Canada loves Aussies. @TheEllenShow
@springsteen I'd also love to dance with the Lights Man who was grooving along all night. Maybe I should start a campaign. :-) Dreaming.
@springsteen We bought them last night, still buzzing,thanks again. Wished I could afford to fly Interstate, so I might see The River, live.
@9NewsAdel @springsteen @realDonaldTrump We stood & cheered as one, united with our Global Brothers & Sisters for #EqualRights & sanity.
@RubyRose He's a Dictator, only cares about his ego. I was at @springsteen Concert last night, proud to stand with him in protest in SA.
@springsteen Bruce, I love you, but can't believe we missed,The River, again, my brother feels the same. Please fly us to another Concert.
So proud to be there to stand with you to let the World know, we are united against the actions of POTUS!… https://t.co/xdX4WIBSXo
@springsteen Wow, what a night, thank you Bruce & all the E Street Band, I can't sleep I'm still buzzing, please come back soon. #theboss
@janemarielynch I've always been grateful I'm Australian, now even more so, You can always move here. Sorry for you all.
I wish there could have been a Draw too. @RafaelNadal @rogerfederer True Gentlemen, Icons, Legends, #Champions @AustralianOpen @7tennis
@RafaelNadal @rogerfederer Thankyou for working hard & letting Millions of people enjoy your talents.@AustralianOpen #2Champions #Fedal2017
@toddwoodbridge @AustralianOpen @lleytonhewitt @7tennis @rogerfederer Can't believe you get paid to do that. I would do it for free. :-)
@RafaelNadal Sorry you didn't win, you are a true Champion, well done on getting there, awesome effort. #AusOpen @7tennis Next year!
@Nike @rogerfederer Both underdogs, @nike must be happy, you have all the Champs. Would love some of those magicshoes.@RafaelNadal #AusOpen
@AustralianOpen Wow, what a Match. Congrats @rogerfederer Hold you headup @RafaelNadal you're a warrior, welcome back. @7tennis #AusOpen
@7tennis I hope you're keeping Jim hydrated, we all know who he loves. Breathe, Jim, breathe! #VamosRafa #FedererNadal #AusOpen
@AustralianOpen How long will the 5th Set be??? Going to be a ripper! @7tennis #AusOpen #Fedal2017 @usopen #VamosRafa
@usopen I bet there are more people watching #RafaVsFed @AustralianOpen than a certain other event in the US recently. ;-) @7tennis
@springsteen Please play The River tomorrow night, how about, Stand Up For Your Rights? Can't wait, are you watching #RafaVsFed #AusOpen
#VamosRafa More of that sizzling stuff! @7tennis #AusOpen
@newscomauHQ I agree, I turned the volume way down until it was done. #AusOpen @7tennis
@AustralianOpen Did they have a deal? You take 1st, I'll take 2nd, then it's Game on! :-) #AusOpen @7tennis #RafaVsRoger #VamosRafa
@AustralianOpen @RafaelNadal will be the only man to win all Slams twice in the Open era. Woohoo Fingers crossed, #GoRafa @7tennis #AusOpen

@AustralianOpen @rogerfederer @RafaelNadal Adelaide, unless there is room for me there and you fly me over. lol #AusOpen 😂

@TennisChannel @AustralianOpen I would if I could, pity Aussies can't watch it, who can sleep after that Match? #AusOpen
@AustralianOpen Recover well @RafaelNadal I'll be cheering you on sun. night. Wished I could be there., watching from Adelaide. @7tennis
@AustralianOpen We love you @RafaelNadal Thankyou for being you. #AusOpen @7tennis @TennisChannel Can't wait for Sunday.
@AustralianOpen @7tennis Wow, that is one of the best Matches I've ever seen, Congrats to both @RafaelNadal & #dimitrov thankyou. #AusOpen

Making a Cuppa, oh boy. #AusOpen Match of the Year in January? @7tennis @AustralianOpen @ESPNTennis @bbctennis
